name: Resolution_20-393.pdf
text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
D.C. Resolution 20-393, effective January 7, 2014

20 DCSTAT 3088

A RESOLUTION

Proposed
Resolution
20-438

To confirm the appointment of Ms. Claudia McKoin to the Rental Housing Commission.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Rental Housing Commission Claudia McKoin Confirmation
Resolution of 2014".

Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the appointment of:
Ms. Claudia McKoin
1610 Tamarack Street, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20012
(Ward 4)
as a member of the Rental Housing Commission, established by section 201 of the Rental
Housing Act of 1985, effective July 17, 1985 (D.C. Law 6-10; D.C. Official Code § 423502.01), replacing Marta Berkley, for a term to end July 18, 2016.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Rental
Housing
Commission
Claudia
McKoin
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
title: Rental Housing Commission Claudia McKoin Confirmation Resolution of 2014
